I edited the content for Prompting in disclose uncertainty, Changes focuses on the complexity of assessing reliability in Large Language Models (LLMs) and emphasising uncertainty quantification (UQ) in black-box LLMs. Proposed metrics for handling uncertain outputs, derived from experiments on question-answering datasets, were incorporated, as well as information on evaluating these large language models.
